262233.「これは 大魔王 <pc>様。\n ワタクシ しがない作家をしておりマス\n <:
This is the Great Demon King , myself a humble writer <%sL_NPC_NAME>. I am writing this autobiography on behalf of you,
the Great Demon King. Yes, well, autobiographies of great men are very popular. I would like to discuss with you about this...
Since you have not been known in the Demon World for a long time, you do not have enough episodes for your autobiography compared to
the Great Demon Kings of the past. Therefore, we would like you to report to myself by doing something that will make you famous as a Great
Demon King! We will suggest what you should do in the form of a request form from myself. Of course, if you report to us, we will pay you a
small reward for your coverage.

262234.「どうか お引き受け いただけないでショウか？\n<yesno><break>:
Please, will you take care of this for me?
<yesno><break>

262235.「さすがは 大魔王となられた お方デス！\n そう言ってくださると 思っていまシ:
I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great Demon Lord herselfhimself! I knew you'd say that.
Here's the current request list you can tackle.

262236.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は\nエピソード依頼帳（だいじなもの）を\n:
<pipipi_off>
<pc> received
the Episode Request Book (Key Item)!
<me 60>

262237.「そうデスか……。\n 気が変わりましたら\n いつでも お声がけくだサイ。:
I see... If you change your mind, please feel
free to let me know.

262238.「これは <pc>様。\n 自叙伝は 鋭意執筆中で ございマス。\n 本日は ど:
If it isn't Lord <pc>. I'm
hard at work creating your autobiography.
What can I do for you today?
<break>

262239.「他に何か ご用件は ございマスか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can do for you?
<break>

262240.「おやめになられるのデスね。\n では また ご用がございましたら\n お声がけ:
I see. Well, if you need me again, please
let me know.

262241.「依頼の状況は だいじなものにある\n エピソード依頼帳で 確認できマスので\n:
You can check the status of your requests at
any time by checking the Episode Request Book
in your Key Items.

262242.「おお！ ご報告いただけるのデスね！\n ご報告は まとめてなさいマスか？\n<:
Oh! You have something to report to me? Do
you want to report it all at once?
<break>

262243.「フムフム……<wait 500> ナルホド……<wait 500>\n そんな:
Mmm-hmm... I see... You don't say...
Thanks for your report! Your story was marvelous, and I can easily envision your success!
Please accept this as a token of my thanks!

262246.「もちものが いっぱいのようデスね。\n お礼を お渡ししマスので どうぐかばん:
Looks like you're carrying too many things.
Please rearrange your belongings so I can
give you your reward.

262247.「それでは 引き続き\n 依頼のご報告を お待ちしておりマス。\n よろしくお願:
I look forward to hearing from you. Thank you
for your cooperation!

262248.「お願いした依頼は\n すべて 達成されたようデスね。\n<bw_break>:
It appears that all of your requests have
been completed.
<bw_break>

262249.「さて 申し訳ないのデスが\n 続けて お願いしたい依頼が ございマス。\n お:
Please excuse me, but I have another request.
Will you accept it?
<yesno><break>

262250.「おお！ さすがは大魔王となられた お方デス！\n それでは……\n<bw_br:
I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great
Demon King! Now then...
<bw_break>

262252.「これだけ エピソードがあれば\n 充分 続きを書くことが できそうデス！\n<:
With this many episodes, I have much more
material to write about!
<bw_break>

262253.「書き進めるうちに また 新たなエピソードが\n 必要になると思いマスので\n:
I'll be certain to need more episodes to write
about, so please come back again soon!

262254.「今のところ お願いしている依頼は\n ないようデスね。\n<bw_break>:
There aren't any new requests at the moment.
<bw_break>

262255.「じつは また <pc>様に\n お願いしたい依頼が あるのデスが\n お願いで:
Actually, Lord <pc>, I have a request
I'd like to ask of you.
<yesno><break>

262256.「……達成済みで まだ 報酬を受け取っていない\n 依頼があるようデスね。\n:
...You have requests that have been fulfilled,
but you haven't been rewarded for yet.
Please report them to me first.
<bw_break>

262257.「依頼書を 更新するのデスね。\n 今のリストは 上書きされてしまいマスが\n:
You want to update the request list? If you do
that, the current one will be overwritten.
Is that all right?
<yesno2><break>

262258.「今のところ お願いしたい依頼は\n お渡ししているもので すべてになりマス。\:
So far, the requests we've given you are all we have. New request forms will be available every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m. so please
come back again.

262260.「今のところ ご報告いただいたエピソードだけで\n 充分 続きを書くことが でき:
So far, the episodes you've reported are enough for me to continue writing. New request forms will be available every Sunday morning
at 6:00 a.m. so please come back again.

262261.「何について ご説明いたしまショウ？\n<break>:
What would you like to talk about?
<break>

262262.「<pc>様の 自叙伝を 書くために\n 大魔王として ハクがつくような\n エ:
In order to write the autobiography of , I would like you to create an episode that will be highly regarded as the
Great Demon King. I will suggest what to do in the form of a request form from myself. We will also provide you with a small reward for
the work you accomplish. Although I may look like this, I am proud to say that I am one of the best penmanship artists in the myself
Demon World, so please feel free to entrust your work to me. I will make sure that you will be satisfied with my work!

262263.「依頼をこなすには まず ワタクシから\n 依頼書を 受け取ってくだサイ。\n<:
To complete a request, you must first receive a request form from myself, in which I will store five episode requests. You can proceed
with all of the episode requests at the same time. You may proceed in any order. Please report to myself when you have completed the
request. You can report separately for each request or all the requests at once. The more episodes we receive, the better we can make
the work, so please cooperate with us!

262264.「新しい 依頼書があるときは\n 手元のリストを 新しいものに\n 更新すること:
When you have a new request form, you can update the current list with the new one. You can update your list at any time you like,
even if your current list is still in progress. However, please note that any requests that have not been completed by the
time the list is updated will be lost. If you have already completed a request, you will receive a reward, so please report your
request first. If there are no new requests, the list cannot be updated. New request form will be available once a week, every Sunday
morning at 6:00am.

262265.「依頼を ご報告いただければ\n 達成した依頼に応じて 報酬をお渡ししマス。\n:
If you report a request, you will receive a reward according to the requests you have accomplished. Please note that the reward
experience will be given to the vocation when you report the request. Of course, if you are in training mode, we can give you the reward
with a training stamp.

<pc> received <%dL_EXP> EXP
as a reward!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps
as a reward for <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> cleared requests!

263149.「胸が躍るような スバらしいご報告を\n お待ちしておりマス！:
I'm looking forward to hearing your exciting
stories!

263192.「どちらの依頼のお話を\n お聞かせいただけマスか？: May I ask which request you're referring to?

263193.「お礼の 経験値は\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> Pになりマスが\n このまま:
The total amount of experience you'll earn is
<%dL_EXP> points. Do you wish to accept it now?
<yesno><break>

263194.「今の職業デスと レベル上限に達しているため\n 経験値は お渡しできまセンが\:
I can't give you any experience because you're
at the maximum level with your current
vocation, is that okay?
<yesno><break>

263195.「お礼の 特訓スタンプは\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> 個になりマスが\n この:
The total amount of training stamps you'll
earn is <%dL_EXP>. Do you wish to accept it now?
<yesno><break>

263196.「今の職業デスと 特訓スタンプが\n 上限に達しているため アイテムのみの\n:
You've reached both the experience and
training stamp limit for this vocation, so
I can only give the item reward. Is that okay?
<yesno><break>

263197.「かしこまりまシタ！\n それでは 早速 お聞かせくだサイ！:
Understood! Now then, please tell me all about
your exploits!

263198.「依頼はまだ 継続中のようデスね。\n 引き続き よろしくお願いいたしマス！:
It seems you still have some ongoing requests.
I appreciate your continued efforts!

268294.「依頼はまだ 継続中のようデスね。\n 引き続き よろしくお願いいたしマス！\n:
It seems you still have some ongoing requests.
I appreciate your continued efforts!

296915.<icon_exc_npc 9002>\n「おっと！ 最後に お伝えすることがあ:
Oh, right! I have one more annoucement. To celebrate the 10th Anniversary, I'll be also offering a special reward.
I'll give you 3 10th Anniversary Lotto Tickets for each completed request, in addition to the normal reward. I hope to see you more often!

296916.「ただ今 １０周年のお祝いとして\n 追加の報酬を お渡ししていマス。\n こち:
To celebrate the 10th Anniversary, I'm now
offering an additional reward. Please take
it!
